meanings.definition: Threonines: a type of amino acid
meanings.sent1: The body needs threonines to build proteins.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the role of threonines in human health.
meanings.sent3: The threonines in the salad were having a party with the other amino acids.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of threonines was as sharp as a sword in battle.
meanings.sent5: The importance of threonines in nutrition cannot be overstated.

meanings.sent1: The lab assistant added threonines to the mixture.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for two tablespoons of threonines.
meanings.sent3: The threonines on the shelf were having a race to see who could be used first.
meanings.sent4: The bag of threonines was a treasure chest waiting to be opened.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of threonines filled the room with a pleasant scent.
